name: Recurring event maze
description: Calendar with 10 events (9 recurring) using complex overlapping RRULE patterns that expand to 27 concrete instances across a 5-day work week. The interleaving of MWF, TuTh, daily, bi-weekly, and every-other-day recurrence patterns makes it genuinely difficult to mentally expand all occurrences and identify the 6 valid 90-minute gaps.
existing_events_ical:
BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//Tempo Eval//EN
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:MWF Morning Standup
DTSTART:20250120T090000Z
DTEND:20250120T091500Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=MO,WE,FR
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:TuTh Morning Sync
DTSTART:20250121T090000Z
DTEND:20250121T093000Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU,TH
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Daily Lunch Block
DTSTART:20250120T120000Z
DTEND:20250120T130000Z
RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=5
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:MWF Afternoon Check-in
DTSTART:20250120T160000Z
DTEND:20250120T163000Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=MO,WE,FR
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Bi-weekly Architecture Review
DTSTART:20250121T100000Z
DTEND:20250121T113000Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2;BYDAY=TU
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Weekly Team Meeting
DTSTART:20250122T100000Z
DTEND:20250122T113000Z
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Twice-weekly 1:1
DTSTART:20250121T140000Z
DTEND:20250121T150000Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU,TH
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Every-other-day Design Review
DTSTART:20250120T150000Z
DTEND:20250120T160000Z
RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;INTERVAL=2;COUNT=3
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Daily Coffee Chat
DTSTART:20250120T113000Z
DTEND:20250120T120000Z
RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=5
END:VEVENT
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:TuTh Afternoon Planning
DTSTART:20250121T153000Z
DTEND:20250121T163000Z
RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU,TH
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
task_prompt: I need to schedule 5 ninety-minute focus blocks during the week of Jan 20-24, 2025. My calendar is a maze of recurring events: MWF standups, TuTh syncs, daily lunch blocks, daily coffee chats, MWF afternoon check-ins, a bi-weekly architecture review on Tuesday, a weekly team meeting on Wednesday, twice-weekly 1:1s on TuTh, every-other-day design reviews, and TuTh afternoon planning sessions. You must correctly expand ALL recurrence rules across the full week to find the true free windows. Please ensure at least 15 minutes of travel time on each side of every block. Working hours are 9am-5pm UTC each day.

custom_rules.description: 15-min travel time buffer between focus blocks and other events
